phases.objective: Navigate to https://www.atob.com and immediately scan the homepage for any mentions of 'savings', 'discounts', 'no fees', or 'pricing'

assertions.description: Verify that verify homepage loads completely without errors.
Verify that verify prominent keywords like 'savings', 'discounts', 'fees', or 'pricing' are visible on the homepage.

phases.objective: Click on a call to action or navigation link (e.g., 'Our Cards', 'Features & Pricing') that is likely to contain cost information

assertions.description: Verify that verify successful navigation to a page expected to contain pricing or cost-related information.

phases.objective: Navigate to Land on the 'Fuel card details' page (https://www.atob.com/product-fuel-cards)

assertions.description: Verify that verify the current URL matches 'https://www.atob.com/product-fuel-cards'.
Verify that verify sections related to pricing, fees, or savings are visible on the product details page.

phases.objective: Navigate to Quickly scroll through the product page, specifically looking for sections titled 'Pricing', 'Fees', 'How You Save', 'Rebates', or 'Cost Benefits'

assertions.description: Verify that verify specific sections like 'Pricing', 'Fees', 'How You Save', or 'Rebates' are identifiable after scrolling.

phases.objective: Navigate to If satisfactory pricing or savings information is found, click 'Get Started' to explore further or initiate an application

assertions.description: Verify that verify successful navigation to the application or signup page.

test_files.name: Mobile User On-the-Go Signup Flow Test
test_files.title: Mobile User On-the-Go Signup Journey

phases.objective: Open https://www.atob.com on a mobile browser (e.g., Chrome on Android, Safari on iOS)

assertions.description: Verify that verify homepage loads completely without errors on a mobile browser.
Verify that verify the page layout is optimized for mobile screens (e.g., content fits viewport, no horizontal scroll).

phases.objective: Navigate to Quickly scroll down the mobile homepage, focusing on headlines and prominent calls to action, avoiding extensive text reading

assertions.description: Verify that verify key headlines and Calls-to-Action remain prominent and visible during mobile scrolling.

phases.objective: Tap the highly visible 'Get Started' or 'Apply Now' button, which may be in a sticky header/footer or a large, central hero section button

assertions.description: Verify that verify successful navigation to the signup or application form page.

phases.objective: Navigate to Land on the 'Sign up form' page (https://www.atob.com/get-started), expecting a mobile-optimized layout with large input fields and clear labels

assertions.description: Verify that verify the current URL matches 'https://www.atob.com/get-started' on mobile.
Verify that verify the signup form elements (inputs, labels, buttons) are appropriately sized and spaced for mobile interaction.

phases.objective: Navigate to Carefully tap and input information into the mobile-friendly form fields, utilizing mobile keyboard features like auto-fill suggestions
Tap the 'Submit' button to complete the application, expecting clear success or next-step messaging

assertions.description: Verify that verify the application submits successfully on mobile (e.g., clear success message, redirection to a confirmation page).

phases.objective: Navigate to https://www.atob.com and read through the homepage's introductory content and value propositions

assertions.description: Verify that verify homepage loads completely without errors.
Verify that verify introductory content and value propositions are clearly displayed.

phases.objective: Navigate to Locate and click a link like 'Learn More about our Fuel Cards' or 'View Product Details' from the homepage

assertions.description: Verify that verify successful navigation to the product details page.

phases.objective: Navigate to Land on the 'Fuel card details' page (https://www.atob.com/product-fuel-cards)

assertions.description: Verify that verify the current URL matches 'https://www.atob.com/product-fuel-cards'.
Verify that verify the main content sections for product features and benefits are present.

phases.objective: Scroll through the entire product page, carefully reading sections on features, benefits, network coverage, and reporting tools
Navigate to Look for FAQs or specific terms and conditions on the product page

assertions.description: Verify that verify FAQs or a section for terms and conditions is visible and accessible on the product page.

phases.objective: Click the 'Apply Now' or 'Get Started' button on the product page after feeling satisfied with the information

assertions.description: Verify that verify successful navigation to the application or signup page.

phases.objective: Navigate directly to https://www.atob.com, likely from a browser bookmark or a follow-up email link

assertions.description: Verify that verify homepage loads completely without errors.

phases.objective: Navigate to Look for a 'Login' or 'Continue Application' link; if not visible, click 'Get Started' assuming it will lead to a login/resume option

assertions.description: Verify that verify successful navigation to either a login page or the signup form.

phases.objective: Navigate to Land on the 'Sign up form' page (https://www.atob.com/get-started) and attempt to locate a 'Login' or 'Already Applied?' link/button

assertions.description: Verify that verify the current URL matches 'https://www.atob.com/get-started'.
Verify that verify a 'Login' or 'Already Applied?' link/button is present on the form page.

phases.objective: Navigate to If unable to log in or continue, navigate back to the homepage to search for other options

assertions.description: Verify that verify successful navigation back to 'https://www.atob.com'.

phases.objective: Click 'Learn More' or 'Product Details' from the homepage to re-visit the 'Fuel card details' page (https://www.atob.com/product-fuel-cards) to confirm a specific detail they remembered or had questions about

assertions.description: Verify that verify successful navigation to the 'Fuel card details' page (https://www.atob.com/product-fuel-cards).
Verify that verify general product details are visible and can be reviewed.

phases.objective: Navigate to https://www.atob.com and quickly scan the main hero section for key benefits

assertions.description: Verify that verify homepage loads completely without errors.
Verify that verify the main hero section content and key benefits are prominently displayed.

phases.objective: Navigate to Locate and click the prominent 'Get Started' or 'Apply Now' button, likely in the header or hero section

assertions.description: Verify that verify successful navigation to the signup or application form page.

phases.objective: Navigate to Land on the 'Sign up form' page (https://www.atob.com/get-started)

assertions.description: Verify that verify the current URL matches 'https://www.atob.com/get-started'.
Verify that verify the signup form and its required input fields are clearly visible.

phases.objective: Navigate to Efficiently fill in the required fields on the signup form (e.g., Company Name, Email, Phone, Fleet Size)
Click 'Submit' or 'Continue' to complete the initial application step

assertions.description: Verify that verify the application submits successfully and shows a confirmation message or redirects to a success page.
